Sinopse: Mowgli has been raised in the jungles of India by Baloo the bear, Bagheera the panther and a wolf pack. He is reunited with his childhood friend, Kitty, the daughter of Colonel Brydon and learns the ways of man once more. However, Mowgli soon meets an evil soldier, Captain Boone, who will stop at nothing to get his hands on legendary treasure in the jungle. Mowgli must rely on the help of his animal friends to stop Boone.
